Hello!

I'm Yuxuan Xiong, a full-stack software engineer skilled in designing beautiful user interfaces, robust servers & efficient databases

Currently seeking full-time opportunities!
Download My Resume
Background

I recently graduated from University of Pennsylvania with master's degrees in computer science and architecture, after completing a fulfilling internship at Geward to develop the B2C food ordering platform and serving as a consultant at HDR to deliver Python generative design tools for urban design.

As a full-stack engineer, I take pride in merging design sensibilities with robust engineering practices. Leveraging my expertise in both front-end and back-end development, I craft applications that are not only visually stunning but also architecturally sound. My approach ensures scalability and efficiency from the server and database layers to the user interface, ultimately delivering seamless and captivating user experiences.

When I'm not coding or designing, I enjoy playing tennis, trying out new recipes (primarily Asian style), and photographing architecture, landscape and urban spaces.
